import { useNavigate, useActionData } from "react-router-dom"; import { Form } from "react-router-dom"; import classes from "./EventForm.module.css"; function EventForm({ method, event }) { const data = useActionData(); const navigate = useNavigate(); function cancelHandler() { navigate(".."); } return (
    {data && data.errors && Object.values(data.errors).map((err) =>
  • {err}
    • )}
